Ensure smooth operations and maintain secure access controls by managing users. The {{< var vm_platform >}} offers robust features for managing user profiles, roles, groups, and invitations effectively. 

## Prerequisites

To perform these next steps, you must hold the `Customer Admin` role.[^1]

## User invitations

### Invite new users

1. Log in to the {{< var vm_login >}}.

1. Click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**. 

{{< include _manage-users-invite.qmd >}}

### Monitor user invitations

1. Log in to the {{< var vm_login >}}.

1. Click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**. 

1. Under User Permissions, click **{{< fa envelope >}} Invite New Users**.

{{< include _manage-users-monitor.qmd >}}

## User roles

### Assign new roles to a user

1. Log in to the {{< var vm_login >}}.

1. Click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**. 

1. Under User Permissions, select **{{< fa book-open >}} User Directory**. 

1. Next to any individual user, click the {{< fa circle-plus >}} icon to open the Assign Roles menu for that user. 

1. Click **+** for each role to be assigned.  

1. Click **{{< fa puzzle-piece >}} Assign Roles to User** to save changes.

### Remove roles from a user

1. Log in to the {{< var vm_login >}}.

1. Click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**. 

1. Under User Permissions, select **{{< fa book-open >}} User Directory**. 

1. Click the {{< fa xmark >}} in the pill next to the role for the user that you want to remove.
